SVGAnimatedNumberBaseVal.summary: The baseVal property of the interface represents the base (non-animated) value of an animatable numeric attribute.

remarks.para: Some animatable SVG attributes accept a single numeric value, such as the {{SVGAttr("radius")}} attribute of the circle or ellipse elements and the {{SVGAttr("width")}} and {{SVGAttr("height")}} attributes of the rect element, and many others. The baseVal property reflects and updates the base, or non-animated, value of the numeric attribute.

SVGAnimatedNumberBaseVal.value: A number; the base value of the attribute as a float.
